ygData.msgSnippet: Lol all the newbies hated me yet I gave away everything I wasn not wearoign to them like a full suit of bronze a bloodclaw and some other nice items ( I kited
ygData.messageBody:
Lol all the newbies hated me yet I gave away everything I wasn not wearoign
to them like a full suit of bronze a bloodclaw and some other nice items ( I
kited a sand giant into a group of them on accident once) My Reputation
spread like wildfire but most newbies liked me. I gave away some rubicite and
my Robes my old ones. I want a crimson robe now but my servers to young for
that. Anyways anyone wanna buy some items in RL money if so gimme a tell or
if you wanna buy pp 1000pp for 100dollars 500 for 50dollars.
